entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
